summary: This is a meeting invitation and notice for Ghislaine Maxwell's removal hearing (case 20mj132-01) scheduled for July 2, 2020, at 3:30 p.m. It provides ZoomGov access details and court rules prohibiting recording or broadcasting of the remote proceedings.

persons.name: Kathleen DuPont
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the email forwarding the hearing notice and access details for Ghislaine Maxwell's removal hearing.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the removal hearing (case 20mj132-01) for which this meeting invitation and access instructions are provided.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Removal Hearing
events.description: Scheduled court hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell's removal proceedings (case 20mj132-01) to be conducted via ZoomGov videoconference and teleconference.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's removal hearing (case 20mj132-01) was scheduled for July 2, 2020, at 3:30 p.m.
The hearing was to be conducted remotely via ZoomGov, with strict rules against photographing, broadcasting, or televising the proceedings.
Access to the video conference was restricted to 'necessary case participants,' while others could join via telephone.
The document shows the court's adaptation to remote proceedings during 2020, with specific login details (Meeting ID: 160 146 2933, Password: 182411) provided.
